title: gawddamn another example of whiteknighting
body:
so this beggar on the front page posts her "hard times" and wants donations for a stream.
it seems fine until I see her (his) name: "MissyMegan".
I click the link that says "life story"

**AND WHAT THE FUCK DO I SEE HERE**

MissyMegan
**Professional Girl Gamer**
*Boobies and More!*
Twitch.tv/xMissyMeganx
Twitter.com/xMissyMeganx

and 50+ upvotes http://imgur.com/Zw468as
uh...
